Title: Department for Transport (DFT)
Text: We work to make transport greener, safer and support the economic growth of the UK.

Title: Department for Communities and Local Government (DCLG)
Text: We work to move decision-making power from central government to local councils.
Keywords: DCLG, CLG, department for communities, department for communities and local government

Title: Building Regulations Advisory Committee (BRAC)
Text: We give advice to the Department for Communities and Local Government on building regulations for England and are consulted before DCLG makes any changes to the building regulations
Keywords: BRAC, building regulations, building regulations advisory committee

Title: Planning Inspectorate (PINS)
Text: We deal with all planning applications and appeals in England and Wales, including national infrastructure planning, listed building appeals and rights of way orders.

Title: Driving Standards Agency (DSA)
Text: We promote road safety in Great Britain by improving driving standards.
Keywords: DSA, driving standards, driving standards agency
